it.polimi.se2018.network.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientController

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientController
    Class based on the Abstract Factory Design Pattern. This class define the client side of the game. This class implements ClientController to have basic methods for RMI and Socket Client.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starter for the client. This method start the client using the assigned address and port.
        Parameters:
        args - parameters used for the connection.

      • startClient

        public void startClient(java.lang.String serverIpAddress,
                        int socketRmi)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Visual starter of the client.
        Specified by:
        startClient in interface ClientController
        Parameters:
        serverIpAddress - address on where the server side communication are open.
        socketRmi - number used to manage the decision of the user about the connection. RMI (=0) SOCKET (=1).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startRMIClient

        public boolean startRMIClient(java.lang.String serverIpAddress,
                              int rmiPort)
        Starter for the RMI connection.
        Parameters:
        serverIpAddress - address on where the server side communication are open.
        rmiPort - port used for RMI connection.
        Returns:
        true if the connection is established, false otherwise.

      • startSocketClient

                                 int socketPort)
        Starter for the Socket connection.
        Parameters:
        serverIpAddress - address on where the server side communication are open.
        socketPort - port used for Socket connection.
        Returns:
        true if the connection is established, false otherwise.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String nickname)
        Remote method used to log the user to the server with his nickname.
        Specified by:
        login in interface ClientController
        Parameters:
        nickname - name of the player associated to the client.
        Returns:
        true if the user is logged, false otherwise.

      • sendEventToController

        public void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
        Remote method used to send to the server a request to unleash an event.
        Specified by:
        sendEventToController in interface ClientController
        Parameters:
        eventController - object that will use the server to unleash the event associated.
